entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to snow late this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
